patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. McCune-Albright syndrome (MAS)
2. Neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1)
3. Melanotic Xanthogranuloma (MXG)
4. Osteitis fibrosa cystica (OFHC) or fibrous dysplasia of bone
5. Legius syndrome
6. Noonan syndrome with multiple lentigines (NS-ML)
7. LEOPARD syndrome
8. Sotos syndrome
9. Phakomatosis pigmentovascularis
10. Incontinentia Pigmenti (IP) 

Each of these conditions can present with a combination of cafe-au-lait spots, fibrous dysplasia, and other systemic features that could potentially include visual and craniofacial abnormalities. It is important to note that a thorough clinical evaluation, including family history, physical examination, and appropriate laboratory and imaging studies, is necessary to confirm a diagnosis.
